com.day.commons.datasource.jdbcpool

Class JdbcPoolService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.day.commons.datasource.jdbcpool.JdbcPoolService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourcePoolProvider

    @Service(value=DataSourcePoolProvider.class)
 @Property(name="service.description",value="Day Commons Data Source Pool implementation") @Property(name="service.vendor",value="Day Management AG")
public class JdbcPoolService
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSourcePoolProvider
    A DataSourcePoolProvider that manages pooled j2ee DataSources.

    Declared as a configuration factory - we want one instance of this component for each configured DataSource

      static int DEFAULT_MAX_WAIT_MSEC
      Default time to wait for an available connection, in msec

      If DataSourceConfig.maxWaitMsec has this value, block forever on empty pool

      If DataSourceConfig.maxWaitMsec has this value, fail immediately on empty pool
